channel.title: Having trouble logging in
channel.description:
Hi, I played moparscape before, and I was able to go onto other servers. Now, its been a while, and I'm having trouble.
I can make my own server, but I want to be able to go onto other servers. Ill go through step by step what happens.
1. I start moparscape. 2. i do file>new port>(enter the port of some random server from the server list) 3. then,file>new server>(enter the IP of some random server from the list) 4. Then I put click Enter, type in a username and password, and it says "no response from server, please try using a different world"
I'm on a iMac G5, I have Safari as web browsser, ummmmmm, i tried to be as helpful as i could. I know you guys deal with lots of noobs trying to get started on this game, and i know it must be stressful helping us out. hopefully you guys know wats wrong and can help me. Thanks a lot.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 04:59:50 pm[/size][hr]actually, i think Im getting a new types of Error
Now, when i try it says "Error connecting to the server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "start server" to make your own."

item.title: Having trouble logging in
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Maul Ancient Maul
item.description:
@Ancient_Maul wrote:

http://www.client.silabsoft.org/client.php try that webclient it will be more stable.

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble logging in
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Have you ever though, maybe the server is down.

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble logging in
item.dc:creator: @Welkerr Welkerr
item.description:
@Welkerr wrote:

Hi, I played moparscape before, and I was able to go onto other servers. Now, its been a while, and I’m having trouble.

I can make my own server, but I want to be able to go onto other servers. Ill go through step by step what happens.

  1. I start moparscape.
  2. i do file>new port>(enter the port of some random server from the server list)
  3. then,file>new server>(enter the IP of some random server from the list)
  4. Then I put click Enter, type in a username and password, and it says
    “no response from server, please try using a different world”

I’m on a iMac G5, I have Safari as web browsser, ummmmmm, i tried to be as helpful as i could. I know you guys deal with lots of noobs trying to get started on this game, and i know it must be stressful helping us out. hopefully you guys know wats wrong and can help me. Thanks a lot.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 04:59:50 pm[/size][hr]actually, i think Im getting a new types of Error

Now, when i try it says
“Error connecting to the server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “start server” to make your own.”

Read full topic
